explains: adj. 古老的；由来已久的

sentences.en: This age-old struggle for control had led to untold bloody wars.
sentences.cn: 这种由来已久的对控制权的争夺已经导致了无数的血腥战争。

sentences.en: We can only try to hold fast to the age-old values of honesty, decency and concern for others.
sentences.cn: 我们只能努力坚守那些古老的价值观：诚实、正派、关心他人。

sentences.en: There may be an age-old solution.
sentences.cn: 有一个古老的解决办法。
